text: Tareef Allah hi ke liye hai jo aasmaano aur zameen ka banane wala aur Farishton ko paigham rasaan muqarrar karne wala hai. (Aisey Farishtey) jinke do do aur teen teen aur chaar chaar baazu (wings) hain. Woh apni makhooq ki saakht mein jaisa chahta hai izafa karta hai. Yaqeenan Allah har cheez par qadir hai
